fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Email Engagement Trends
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to track multiple percentage metrics over time (open rate and click-through rate).

InputDefinition.userMessage: How has our email open rate and click-through rate changed month by month this year? Show both metrics on the same chart. I'd like to click on a month to see the actual emails sent during that period.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a chart showing both open rate and click-through rate
Two distinct lines or series for the two metrics
Covers all months of current year
Chart clearly distinguishes between the two metrics with legend or labels
Chart supports drill-down to show email list with engagement stats for selected month
Email table allows opening individual email records
